Notice: To obtain the receipt by post, please contact our customer services at 0809 079 888 within 5 days from the funding date of your wallet, to confirm your postal address and receipt content. (Office Hour: Monday ‐ Sunday, 9:00 ‐ 20:00)

To use this service, you must first save your credit card information with your account. Do you want to save your credit card information?

When you subscribe to this service, [Automatic Funding] will be set to [On]. If your wallet does not have enough funds when an automatic subscription renewal is due, it will be automatically funded from the credit card on record to cover the renewal cost (at least the minimum funding amount will be added). For details, refer to the Terms of Service and User Agreement. You can change the [Automatic Funding] setting at any time, in [Transaction Management] under [Account Management] after the purchase is complete.
This service cannot be used on this account.
